summary: The current body model & texture I use in my game. Based on UNP Delicate.
descriptionHtml:
First thing I have to say is this: I use a lot of different face Mods, so the face files I uploaded here won\'t be exactly the same I used on the Screen Shots. The body however, will look just like it. I recommend you install everything, otherwise you will have neck seams.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MOD HISTORY:

This MOD is the result of several hours downloading and editing every body model & texture I could find until I achieved a result I personally liked. I started the creation of this body model editing the UNP Body (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709). Combining it with some other mods and resources, and changing some details on .Nifscope and Photoshop, I achieved this.

The body slider covers from very skinny to chubby. I prefer it than having a body slider that would just increase the size of the female hips and breasts. In someway, it feels more natural.

The texture, on the other hand, doesn\'t try to approach reality: since I play with a vampire girl, I was looking for the utmost pale skin, which wasn\'t possible even when using Increased Slider Colors (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6923). So I painted the female texture to make it even more white. In that way, I can have very pale women, and also vanilla colored or even tanned or black girls (with the help of Increased Slider Colors). The skin is very smooth and delicate, so if you want rough and realistic skins, this may be not the right Mod.

The face texture I posted here is an edited version of a lot of other face textures put together. Since I researched and took parts of over 50 different body textures to create those, I won\'t reference to everyone of them. Most of the faces, however, were taken from this Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27785

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTALATION:

To install this body model and texture, copy the Data file into \"Program Data->Steam->Steam Apps->Common->Skyrim\" and replace everything.

I recommend doing a back up of every file inside the folders \"Meshes->Actors->Characters->Character Assets\" and \"Textures->Actors->Character->Female\" inside the Data folder, just in case you don\'t like the result and want to remove this Mod later.
author: Shishiwashi
